name: TinyLand: Build Your Own Tiny Planet!
name_original: TinyLand: Build Your Own Tiny Planet!
description:
Slimey, a boy who wants to craft things, finds a magical paintbrush that can allow the user to build their own tiny planet! Now, Slimey must craft his own tiny planet with the tools given to him in his toolbox!

Music by Heatley Bros

Made in 2 days, so it's a little rough. In future updates i'll smooth everything out and make it look higher quality.

Controls:

LRUD arrows to move, click the items in your toolbox and drag them anywhere you like! You can also move them around after they've been placed!

Hope you enjoy the game!
